txt.en: 'The Orcs no longer have the materials to build more siege-weapons, which is a strong blow against their continuing ability to wage war; however, we have yet to reduce their existing ability.\n\n'Our next strike needs to focus on making sure the weapons they have are useless. Return to the south-east, back to Dr没-garmadh, and defeat the Moria siege-masters. Without them, the siege-weapons are nothing but piles of wood.'
'The siege-masters have fallen, and thus their weapons stand idle. We have little to fear from Dr没-garmadh, yet there is one final strike yet to be made.'
'If the siege-weapons do not have masters, they are no threat.'
With the materials for building gone, the dwarves want to next eliminate the operators of the siege-weaponry.
Moria siege-masters can be found at Dr没-garmadh, south-east of Mekhem-bizru.\n\nDagfari wants to next eliminate the Moria siege-masters who operate the great siege-weapons.
Dagfari is in Mekhem-bizru, north-west of Dr没-garmadh.\n\nDagfari will want to hear of the defeat of the siege-masters.
